metadata.title: CVE-2018-13867 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the HDF HDF5 1.8.20 library. There is an out ofbounds read in the function H5F__accum_read in H5Faccum.c.

criterions.comment: hdf5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
